text: welcome to our basic series these videos
have real English for low level
beginners our teachers teach you words
and expressions you should know all of
these videos are helpful to improve your
English so never give up it's important
to watch these videos and also do some
self-study check any new words you don't
understand in a dictionary and try to
always repeat what the teacher says
these videos can be difficult to
understand at first but keep watching
you will get better you will improve
